data.title: Christian Berkel
data.meta_description: Christian Berkel. Actor: Operation Walküre - Das Stauffenberg-Attentat. Christian Berkel was born on 28 October 1957 in West Berlin, West Germany. He is an actor, known for Operation Walküre - Das Stauffenberg-Attentat (2008), Codename U.N.C.L.E. (2015) and Trumbo (2015). He has been married to Andrea Sawatzki since 17 December 2011. They have two children.
data.text: Christian Berkel was born on October 28, 1957 in West Berlin, West Germany. He is an actor, known for Operation Walküre - Das Stauffenberg-Attentat (2008), Codename U.N.C.L.E. (2015) and Trumbo (2015). He has been married to Andrea Sawatzki since December 17, 2011. They have two children.
